cz.ive.genius
Interface AreaGenius

All Superinterfaces:
Genius, java.io.Serializable, Updateable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AreaGeniusImpl, QueueGenius
public interface AreaGenius
extends Genius

Area genius provides services for geniuses who doesn't want to operate with their actors through accepting deleagation of processes.

Author:
ondra

Method Detail

setDelegationTable

void setDelegationTable(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> table)
Sets up the delegation table. It is a map from processId of the DelegatedProcessTemplates to the goalId of the goals to be fullfilled for the given process.

Parameters:
table - The new delegation table.

startDelegation

ProcessResult startDelegation(IveObject actor,
                              ProcessExecution execution)
Passes the given process to this area genius.

Parameters:
actor - Real object of the actor of the process.
execution - Execution of a process to be delegated.

stopDelegation

ProcessResult stopDelegation(ProcessExecution execution)
Asks the the area genius to stop the given process. It may, but does not have to, do so immediately.

Parameters:
execution - Execution of the process which delegation to finish.
Returns:
ProcessResult signaling current state of the delegation. Explicitely RUNNING state means that the delegation will continue for a while and then itself call stop() on the process.

interruptDelegation

void interruptDelegation(ProcessExecution execution)
This method instantly stops the delegation. It is called as a consequence of the LOD changes.

Parameters:
execution - ProcessExecution of the process which delegation to finish instantly.

setCleaningGoals

void setCleaningGoals(java.util.List<Pair<TriggerTemplate,java.lang.String>> cg)
